articles.author: Mix
articles.title: Award-winning film director robs grocery store to prove piracy is wrong
articles.description: Vexed to discover grocery store employees have been illegally downloading his movie, director Casey Tebo decided to execute the ultimate revenge on piracy.

articles.author: Matthew Hughes
articles.title: Retro Patents let you decorate your wall with the world's greatest ideas
articles.description: If you've got a drab, white-washed bit of wall in desperate need of something eye-catching, you might want to check out Retro Patents.

articles.author: Mix
articles.title: Japan is testing USB phone charging stations in public transport buses
articles.description: Japan knows how to push forward innovation as Tokyo has introduced a public transport bus with dedicated USB phone charging stations.

articles.title: The world’s smallest camera drone can be yours for just $27 right now
articles.description: We love finding great deals for our loyal TNW friends — and we get even more excited when we can get you something cool at the cheapest price possible. articles.author: Steve Olenski
articles.title: 6 reasons your logos fail
articles.description: Six logo design mistakes committed by designers and business persons causing logos to fail.

articles.author: Abhimanyu Ghoshal
articles.title: Instagram is crashing for some users - here's how to fix it
articles.description: Twitter has been abuzz over the past several hours with many users complaining that Instagram's Android and iOS apps are crashing on hitting 'Upload'.

articles.author: Abhimanyu Ghoshal
articles.title: Watch: Drummer covers Pokémon theme in VR
articles.description: Developer Emre Tanirgan began working on Paradiddle, a VR drumming app. See him in action using to belt out a cover of the Pokémon theme.

articles.author: Abhimanyu Ghoshal
articles.title: Send your parents this link the next time they ask which cables to use
articles.description: This site makes it dead-simple for anyone - elderly parents included - to figure out which cable they need to use in order to connect two devices.

articles.author: Abhimanyu Ghoshal
articles.title: Uber fined $20m for misleading drivers about potential earnings
articles.description: Uber has will pay $20 million in a settlement with the FTC after it was found that the company made exaggerated claims about how much drivers could earn.

articles.author: Bryan Clark
articles.title: Amazon announces apprenticeship program to train veterans for high paying tech jobs
articles.description: Amazon today signed an agreement with the US Department of Labor to create an apprenticeship program designed to aid military veterans as they attempt to re-enter the workforce. Through ApprenticeshipUSA, veterans can take on paid internships at Amazon and learn the tech skills needed to move into good paying work, while securing the education needed to compete in …
